title: #41: Crime Scene Assessment and Behavioural Analysis of Meredith Kercher's Murder
description:
WARNING: This episode contains graphic descriptions of a crime scene and a murder.

Jim Clemente and Laura Richards discuss their analysis of the crime scene with Lisa Zambetti and answer questions Meredith Kercher's family still have #HerNameWasMeredith
